group_1.narration: ― Walpurgisnacht ―@AH HA HAAA! AAAH HA HA HAAA!

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashRed2][bgEffect:shakeLarge][surround:6405A04][chara:101900:effect_shake]Eek!

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashRed2][bgEffect:shakeLarge][surround:6405A04][chara:101800:effect_shake]Agh!

group_1.textRight: Careful, Tsukuyo!

group_1.textLeft: Madoka! We should go now!

group_1.textRight: Yeah! Fall back, you guys!

group_1.narration: ― Walpurgisnacht ―@HA HAAA! AAAH HA HA HA!

group_1.textLeft: *Pant* *Whine*
(It's going like it did every time before.)
Nothing's changed, even with all these@Magical Girls here to help.

group_1.textRight: Homura! You can't lose hope, okay?
Look how far we've made it already!
Don't worry. We'll beat it.

group_1.textLeft: Madoka...you're right...
I agree! We just need to regroup...

group_1.textRight: As long as we don't lose hope, we can keep@fighting as much as we need to!

group_1.textLeft: For sure!

group_1.textRight: What...? What was that?

group_1.textLeft: Hey, what the hell's going on?!

group_1.textRight: That magic I sensed just now...

group_1.textLeft: I don't understand this at all!

group_1.textRight: Eve's magic just...changed?

group_1.textLeft: Something must have happened...
Ughhh...
Wh-what was that...? It sent us flying...

group_1.textRight: *Cough* Sis...!
This is an unforeseen predicament... Touka,@Eve's form has...

group_1.textLeft: Completely transformed?!

group_1.narration: ― Touka ―@This can't be! I don't understand!
― Touka ―@Ui's soul is right here, inside Ui,@where we're standing!
― Touka ―@They were linked before, but now@it should be well outside of range...
― Touka ―@And instead of crumbling,@it changed its form altogether?!

group_1.textCenter: It didn't become a Witch. And its soul is@supposed to be gone...

group_1.textRight: I think there can only be one explanation.

group_1.textLeft: What...?

group_1.textRight: You Magius wanted phase transition energy,@which releases when you become a Witch...
You needed to keep Kyubey out in order to@secure that energy for yourselves, right?
And to do that...you made a force field.

group_1.textLeft: I see...
Eve is a big clump of that energy, so the@force field's restraining it too...?

group_1.textRight: What do you think, Touka?!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you, Miss Mighty.
Eve will eventually break down if we leave@it, but it'll take forever.
So we need to get rid of the force field.
The miracle we have going in Kamihama will@fade with Eve's destruction anyway.

group_1.textCenter: Please get rid of the force field for us!

group_1.textRight: Alina?

group_1.textLeft: Haha!
I don't feel like it.

group_1.textRight: Alina? Is this some kind of sick joke?
If it stays up, it will allow Eve to sustain@itself.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I already shrank the force field earlier.
Now it's wrapped tightly around Eve's corpo@perfetto, so it won't break down.

group_1.textRight: I see...

group_1.narration: Eve was destined to crumble apart, @so what changed its form...
Was being wrapped in the force field,@which in turn stabilized its energy.

group_1.textLeft: I don't particularly care how it works.

group_1.textRight: Why? Even attempting to understand your@motives is painful.

group_1.textLeft: Well, you see... I, Alina, care nothing for@the concept of liberation.
My personal goal has always been to achieve@my best artwork yet.
And now, I intend to create that artwork.

group_1.textRight: We raised those Witches together, we even@managed to change their forms.
That wasn't enough to satisfy your desires,@Alina?

group_1.textLeft: Creation and cultivation are entirely@different things.
With Eve in my hands, to serve as my@paintbrush...
I, Alina, will finally be able to create art@in the manner I desire!

group_1.textRight: Do you intend to burn the city even more?

group_1.textLeft: Sì.

group_1.textRight: Alina...

group_1.textLeft: Ahhh ha ha ha ha haaa!!!
Here, Eve...
I shall turn you into my paintbrush for@eterno!
I shall embrace your frozen form, left cold@without a soul to inhabit it!
Alina... She's...

group_1.textRight: It's the same as Mami... Does that mean...
She's dressed in the Uwasa of the Fur God.@I thought we got rid of it...

group_1.textLeft: What'll happen now in that case?
That depends on whatever the [textBlue:Rumor] is,@right?

group_1.textRight: That one warms frozen hearts, and takes away@some of the recipient's life in return.
When Alina shrunk her force field to wrap@around Eve's body...
She must have used the Fur God Uwasa.
Eve shouldn't have anything that constitutes@as life, though...

group_1.textLeft: Then what's gonna happen now?

group_1.textRight: I can't say for sure.
The Uwasa must have taken something other@than Eve's life...

group_1.textCenter: I can tell you that much, at least.
Stealing away life is essentially stealing@something's freedom.
I already tested this on other Witches.

group_1.textRight: You're stealing Eve's...freedom?

group_1.textLeft: Yes. As such, it has become my paintbrush.

group_1.textRight: So next, you intend to shorten the lifespan@of Kamihama itself, using Eve to do so?

group_1.textLeft: Naturalmente!
I, Alina, shall use Eve to set the world@alight.
That is the kind of perfect opera d'arte that@humanity itself clamors to see!

group_1.textRight: I don't understand a word that comes out of@this girl's mouth.
Humanity desires destruction...

group_1.textLeft: I should think that you, Kanagi Izumi, would@understand me perfectly.
You desire the same thing, do you not? To lay@waste to everything around you...

group_1.textRight: ...I can't deny that.
